name: Modern South End Pied a Terre | 1BR 1BA
description:
The South End has recently become the choice neighborhood for Boston's young families, working professionals and artists, among others, and its known best for its many parks, funky shops and its acclaimed cafes and restaurants. Massachusetts Avenue offers great access to the entire City by foot or public transit. This building contains a furnished one bedroom and a three bedroom apartment, both of which are available as nightly, weekly and monthly rentals.

This building was re-built from the bricks in at the end of 2013. All apartments have central AC and heat and contain in-unit laundry facilities. There are very few stairs required to access either of the two units. Please see the individual apartment pages for a full list of amenities.

This location offers easy access by foot to all that the South End has to offer and the Back Bay. All other parts of Boston can be easily accessed via public transit or taxi. The nearest subway stop is 3 blocks away â€“ the Mass Av
